This top is super cute! I really like the print. Looks very early 2000s with some jeans. The fabric is SUPER soft. I was a little shocked at how soft it actually is. It fits very well as well. It is stretchy and not too short for a crop top.

This trendy, vintage baby tee is so, so cute! What stood out to me most is the material. It is incredibly soft and good quality, not the thin, almost see-through fabric that most shirts like these are made of. I was worried that I would have to wear a tank top underneath to avoid it being see-through, but it was fine without. It has a good bit of stretch to it and is very comfortable. I sized up to a Large (my usual size is Medium) to get a little extra length since it is a cropped fit, and the Large fits exactly how I wanted it to. I'm very pleased!
Amazing top! Super fitting and perfect tee! The quality is nice and it’s super soft.
